task.title: Downloading
task.shortdesc: You can download from the Alphaworks Web site. The application is available without charge and for evaluation purposes only.

step.cmd: Scroll to the bottom of the page and click Download now.
Click Proceed without an IBM ID.
In the Business Contact Information area, specify personal information:

substep.cmd: In the First name field, type your given name.
In the Last name field, type your family name.
In the Country or Region field, select the country or region in which you live.

step.cmd: In the License area, click View license.
After reading the license, close the window.
Select the I agree check box, and then click I confirm.
